ing: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded extra-sharp white Cheddar cheese
1 teaspoon grated horseradish, or more to taste
des: "A rich and creamy cheese spread, with a powerful horseradish and cheddar kick. A perfect appetizer for a big dinner or snack for a party. Serve cold with crusty bread or veggies."
ins: Beat cream cheese in a large bowl using an electric hand mixer until light and airy. Mix Cheddar cheese, horseradish, and mustard into cream cheese until fully incorporated. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
